name: perch
content:
perch in, on, etc. something
Add to word list
Add to word list
to sit on or near the edge of something: We perched on bar stools and had a beer.
See more
[ I or T ] to be in a high position or in a position near the edge of something, or to put something in this position: The village is perched on top of a high hill.
